mapper.select: SELECT dr.order_id AS orderId, dr.customer_group_id AS customerGroupId, dr.date, dr.start_time AS startTime, dr.end_time AS endTime, dr.status, dr.create_date AS createDate, dr.update_date AS updateDate, IFNULL(dc.name,dc.nick_name) AS customerName, do.goods_name AS goodsName, dr.creator FROM dr LEFT JOIN d_customer_group dcg ON dcg.id = dr.customer_group_id LEFT JOIN d_customer dc ON dc.id = dcg.customer_id LEFT JOIN d_order do ON do.id = dr.order_id WHERE dr.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( order_id, customer_group_id, date, start_time, end_time, status, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{customerGroupId}, #{date}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )
